value.0:
The Blood Pact - by Macros Darksun

The blood pact, a ritual surrounded in mystery, an act taken by only the most desperate and greedy. It is the act of selling yourself to a demon, yet the demon must also pay you something in return. Many servants of evil take this route to gain wickedly powers, forgetting that a demon rarely gives away power without knowing that you can't use it against him.

The act of making a blood pact is simple; you need a virgin dagger - A blade that has never killed.

First slice a cross shape into your hand, and then have the demon do the same. Now clasp hands and let your blood mingle: the sensation of your hand being burnt off should occur after a short while.

Now, the blood pact is complete. Breaking a blood pact will leave you severely weakened. Only reinstating the pact will regain your power.
